title: ILocalLinearPatternFeatureData.IGetSkippedItemArray
description: Gets the skipped components in this linear component pattern feature.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of skipped pattern instances VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
This array is 0-based. If you skip the 3rd and 5th components in the pattern, then the array looks like ArrayOut[0] = 3 and ArrayOut[1] = 5.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
